item.title: Android
item.description: Apps I use or like Flashlight ASTRO File Manager Calendar Cam Scanner Chrome Drive Dropbox Facebook Foursquare (GialloZafferano)(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.banzai.media.gzricette) Google+ gStrings GZafferano Hangouts Keep LectureNotes Maps Play Books Play Music Pocket Runtastic Trains Timetable VLC Whatsapp Settings set data usage warning to a low value restrict background data for G+ restrict background data for Gallery Turn off G+ photos sync Useful links Android Manager Google Dashboard
